website_summaries.verdict: A mat that is masterfully constructed and can help you take your putting skills to the next level.
pros: Comes with 6 movable slope wedge pieces, allowing you to create your very own putting green
Ball leaves a trail on the mat, enabling you to assess your putting skills
Offers 4 different putting speeds for added convenience
Easy to roll out the mat as needed
cons: Wedge pieces may be tough to use at times

customer_reviews.title: JUST perfect for serious training and learning
customer_reviews.text: This does not look like a normal putting surface but it is amazing for serious training. Easily stored, almost infinitely adjustable and real feedback from the surface tracking. I wish they made one six foot wide to really play around with shapes and line.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gale

customer_reviews.title: The ball tracking is great! The different puttng speeds are excellant
customer_reviews.text: This mat is awsome! The ball tracking is great! The different puttng speeds are excellant. The wedges for changing the slopes are cheap but do the job. Ill bee buying at least one more for a birthday or Christmas gift. The booklet with the pratice sessions and games is a nice addition. My friends were blown away by the quality and how well the green speed change worked. 5 Stars! No doubt!
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: My own and unique greens can be built for intensified trainings
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate the designs of the ProAdvanced ProInfinity Putting Mat. with the attached accessories and the adequately long mat, I can establish and simulate various greens at 4 different speeds and practice the most important putting, without worrying about the rain, snow or other weather. Those designs offer me lots of fun and I do not feel putting is boring. besides, as shown in the photo, the putting mat has vivid color and good-quality material. I will buy the second same Mat to set up at my office( this one at home)
customer_reviews.author: Tom Yuan

customer_reviews.title: The best putting mat ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far my favorite putting mat! hitting to one side is fast speed, and the opposite direction is slower! How awesome is that? i love the lines on the mat, it gives me right angles to check my alignment. I absolutely love the extra bits that come with the mat. they can add breaks, also the stopper helps preventing the balls from running away if you accidentally hit a strong putt. On my living room is tilted slight to one side, and adding tiny break to the mat "straightens" it out! (of course it makes a small sneak to the roll but it helps end up in the spot where its marked as the hole!
customer_reviews.author: Jeong cho

customer_reviews.title: Pro Mat
customer_reviews.text: I chose this amt on the recommendation of my PGA pro. He said it is top quality, smooth and consistent. He was right! I can see it's starting to help me with distance control so I have fewer 3 putts. The mat has different speeds for variety, and other tools to change the slope. It's far better than anything else I've tried. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Baffa

customer_reviews.title: More than I think!
customer_reviews.text: I am a game player and play lots of games on pc, PS4, switch, mobile. Those games cost me thousands of dollars. I spent most of my money and time on them. Recently, I got this mat because I do need some physical exercises, recommended by my uncle. I wasn't expected it can bring me so much fun but it did. Now I spent 1~2 hours on it every day. It's more challenging than some of my games but not all of them. I have finished all the training sessions and really want to find someone who can try multiplayer mode with me. Maybe it's time for me to play some real golf now.
customer_reviews.author: Karson

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun and great practice.
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing, I can make banks to increase difficulty, change grain direction to speed up or slow down my shot. I'll get an auto ball return and it'll be absolutely perfect. I like how it was packaged as well. the box is large enough to hold all the items and easily unpack/pack what you need. When I put it up I simply roll the green up and put it all back in the original box without having to stuff things in.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my boyfriend. I researched many many many putting matts & this one seemed to make the most sense. It has so many different features. I know he wanted to take up golfing so I thought this would be a great gift. It's been about 8 months since the purchase and he uses it regularly between commercial breaks and halftime. He also says it helps him think and relieve stress.
customer_reviews.author: Kitana_red

customer_reviews.title: Useful Practice Mat
customer_reviews.text: Nice little putting mat, especially the ability to change the effective green speed. Cup is pretty useless, but not really important. Could use Velcro on the other end to allow attachment of the bumper at both ends.
customer_reviews.author: Walt

customer_reviews.title: ProAdvance Putting mat - Satisfied purchase and great product
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product with outstanding usuable features. A real need for anyone who wants to improve their golf game and practice different swings at the comfort of your home.
customer_reviews.author: A R.

customer_reviews.title: Nice putting surface.
customer_reviews.text: I like practicing my putting with this product. It is versatile: you can "brush" the surface to make the putts role faster or slower; you can putt some bend in the putts with the supplied wedges; and the graphics help with the aligning of the putts and the gauging of the effectiveness of your putting stroke.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Klein

customer_reviews.title: Varispeed putting
customer_reviews.text: I used to have a Varispeed putting mat, but it didn’t work very well so I choose this Proinfinity mat instead. It worked better than my thought and really helped me a lot on putting. With better quality, better feedback, better accessories, and better service, I thought it had totally eclipsed Varispeed, you got what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Q. Guo

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best training putting mat ever
customer_reviews.text: First.... there is a flaw on the mat, didn't' want to go thru the hassle of returning it so decided to keep it... The mat does what it says, it gives you a line for you to trac your putt, so you can adjust your speed / how far back your drawing your putter back.... does a great job...adding the breaks and being able to work on breaks on your short putts is a great asset to this as well.... i sincerely feel if you work with this over the winter you will be a stronger/better putter come spring time!.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great for practice
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product that delivers on all fronts. It has a great amount of accessories to change the mat and help you practice different types of shots and different types of greens. The manual included also has some great training exercises along with some fun games to help make that training fun. The mat is a great gift for anyone in your life that golfs and offers great value for what you pay compared to other products in this range.
customer_reviews.author: Gil Cujcuj

customer_reviews.title: Great practice tool!!!
customer_reviews.text: The only concern I had before purchasing this mat was that placing it on carpet may result in unintended break (slope). And, as a consequence, I would be not be putting on my intended line once I was on an actual green. However my concern was without merit. The mat works great even on carpet. Worth every cent!
customer_reviews.author: michael fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Best product! Please update the guide book!
customer_reviews.text: The metal goal is definitely a game-changer! It adds so much more fun than the rubber hole. With any little angle change, you will have to use totally different strategies. However, the guide book didn't provide any instructions on how to use this metal goal to do some professional training. I think it's quite useful. Two players mode is another party booster. We played a lot during the last rainy weekend at home. Time passed really fast with it. Overall this is my favorite putting mat so far. One small thing to point out is the guide book needs to be updated with the steps on how to train with those accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Excellent training putting mat!
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this putting mat about a year ago and use it for training with my golf academy students when indoors. After a year of lots of use it looks just like i purchased it! I like the fact that it has the lines as my students can use this for better feedback and also getting them to release putter head down the target line! Great putting speed and you can also alter the speed a bit as well with this mat. We actually use this mat “over an actual artificial putting green” again because of the lines when doing putting drills! Many of my students actually have now purchased this putting mat for practice all season long!
customer_reviews.author: Smacky

customer_reviews.title: Useful practice mat.
customer_reviews.text: Nice little putting mat, especially the ability to change the effective green speed. Really like the ability to add pitch to putting. Good for practice or as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great aid in the sea of many
customer_reviews.text: Got this WAYY before COVID-19 and I am happy I did. Works great, the fact you can alter the material texture to fast or slow is amazing. My local course have super slow greens, and this aid helps with training on that. Plus all the items it comes with really make putting fun with how you can shape the mat. My daughter loves it too. the many games you can play, it's well worth it for getting your game on point.
customer_reviews.author: Josh W. J,

customer_reviews.title: I  recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I'm gonna start by saying this is a great practice putting mat. It's functional right out of the box. The ball trace and varispeed work great. My early concern was that it may gets to be pretty easy after a while but I was wrong. With those accessories, especially the metal goal, it can change the difficulty completely. I can see my professional putting skill in not too far futre. Love this thing. Good quality. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Olinalin

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for dialing in putting
customer_reviews.text: I’m tried a number of different putting mats over the years but short of a professionally installed putting green, this is the best I’ve used. I like that there’s grain to the mat and it comes with a brush to smooth out the grain and dial in the speed. One note is that the grain can develop grooves after a few putts so you need to brush it to keep the ball rolling true. The markings are also helpful for dialing in start line and pace. The different cup options are also very helpful for different kinds of practice and it works well with my putt-out. I’d highly recommend it as a convenient and affordable option.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff Coffield

customer_reviews.title: Works well on carpet and on cement/tile.
customer_reviews.text: The putting spreads are great, but if you go into the grain you can only putt one ball on the same line as the ball will follow the last track. Can be annoying so I tend to use the 12.5 speed.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Berg

customer_reviews.title: Lowered my handicap in 1 week :0
customer_reviews.text: To be very frank I did not expect much from this product, but I gave it a try anyway because I will not let my brother keep beating me at golf. Within the week - I improved my handicap! Can't wait to wipe his smile off his smug face. Thank you PROADVANCED ProInfinity Putting Mat - I will have the best sleep of my life thanks to you.
customer_reviews.author: patrick

customer_reviews.title: Best Putting Mat I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Adjustable Speed, Great Quality, Easy roll up for storage, can add breaks, play games with your friends, distance markings and center line. If you want to improve your putting this mat has it all. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: RMClubfitter

customer_reviews.title: Play time
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I decided to try a new entertainment for ourselves. A perfect gift and new sensations are provided for you! Now, instead of lying on the couch, we play mini-golf again. The quality of the goods is very good, I did not regret my purchase. All these obstacles make the game only more fun. Rough coating allows your ball to roll along your well-defined path. If something carpeting is easy to clean with a counter in case of contamination. Compact size and light weight add an advantage to this entertainment.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Weber

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The product didn't work for me...wasn't happy with the roll. I will say though that the customer service is exceptional. They reached out to me and said I could keep that mat and gave me my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Seth McBee

customer_reviews.title: Quality and it’s really a great practice and teaching surface
customer_reviews.text: great practice for the different courses you play has different green speeds this practice surface let’s you pick the speed you want to practice for it really works
customer_reviews.author: Mark Crunk

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Let me say first that I don't usually write reviews like this, but this is a fantastic product. It is as advertised. I can already see a difference after just a few practice sessions. It has games you can play, also, which is nice in the winter months. My wife doesn't play golf, but enjoys putting, so this can be good family fun. Great product
customer_reviews.author: francis koebel

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I like that this mat is easy to assemble and disassemble since I live in a small apartment. The quality is great when I roll it out it lays flat easily. When the mat is out it doesn't take up too much space which works well for me since I like to use it in my balcony. One small thing is that the box is a little bit small so it's always hard to find a space for my favorite part, the metal goal.
customer_reviews.author: GMYJ

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and put away. Mat lays flat on its own. Can simulate different green speeds. Includes accessories that provide for a variety of drills beyond simply the length/pace of the putt. Keep in mind, if your floor is not level, the putts will break accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent putting green
customer_reviews.text: Love the smooth ball tracking feature and the wedges for added challenge. Comparable to smooth greens. I definitely would recommend to other golfers!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly C Jobst

customer_reviews.title: Not a customer friendly company!
customer_reviews.text: Not a great product for the money, and not a customer friendly company! Tried to inquire about a return unsuccessfully. Very disappointed! -
customer_reviews.author: PE Teach

customer_reviews.title: Awesome value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend for Christmas, and he absolutely loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: keely

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I am really working on my putting and you can't always get to a real green and this is a ton of fun
customer_reviews.author: David Gunter

customer_reviews.title: Big time players make big time putts!
customer_reviews.text: If you’re looking to squeeze a few minutes here and there for some additional putting and don’t have time to drive to the course, this needs to be on the house or the office. Different speeds, different breaks, and there’s still plenty on cash to be made with your friends at the office.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Holm

customer_reviews.title: Major design flaw
customer_reviews.text: Putts down the center line, the ball is directed to the center of the mat. (Any slight misses will appear to be perfect puts.) I assume it has to do with the the fact that each side of the mat have a different speed design, but I’m not certain what’s causing it
customer_reviews.author: stef

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: It's a little expensive but it's the best putting mat on the market. Very durable.
customer_reviews.author: VILL

customer_reviews.title: Great indoor training aid
customer_reviews.text: This mat offers a fantastic option for practice putting indoors (at your office, in your home, etc.). It has realistic green speeds and allows you to use the training lines to assist you with aiming, or by moving to the side of the mat, get rid of those and rely on your eyes only.
customer_reviews.author: Robert N.

customer_reviews.title: Great training mat
customer_reviews.text: Great well made putting mat that has markedly improved my putting game. My 11 year old son learned how to putt on this mat and he enjoys putting with the different speeds and slope variations. Highly recommend this mat if you are looking to improve your putting stroke.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helpful for putting
customer_reviews.text: Very good surface to practice putting. Just big enough. Easy to put down and roll up.
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: Definately good quality. Had two cheaper ones first, ended up upgrading to this one.
customer_reviews.text: Great putting mat. The only negative is the oversize cup. I purchased two of the cheaper ones first and would only recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Fan

customer_reviews.title: Lite weight great for seniors to move
customer_reviews.text: Great mat for indoor use. Very lite also have a welling 10 ft mat. Use this one indoors. You can use the welling mat outdoors as it is much heavier.
customer_reviews.author: steven george

customer_reviews.title: A nice putting mat to work on your game
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun putting mat to work on your putting game. It has variable green speeds and allows you to improve on your putting stroke and putting distance control.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Knight

customer_reviews.title: Great putting aid.
customer_reviews.text: Great for correcting alignment of your stance and putting stroke. Great practicing tool.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Cook

customer_reviews.title: Great aid
customer_reviews.text: Really like the ability to add pitch to putting. Great visual feedback and ability to put with and against the grain.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product and an even better company!
customer_reviews.text: The only thing better than this mat is the customer service. Reached out to the ProAdvanced team and they responded immediately with their help. Can not recommend this mat enough.
customer_reviews.author: Cj Sweetin

customer_reviews.title: Great putting green
customer_reviews.text: I got one for my brother as a birthday gift and he was excited to test it out! The product felt like it was made from good quality material. The ball roll on the mat smoothly. Thinking of getting one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Lin

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Got it as a gift last year and after using this for a year, the quality is still great! It’s a good length mat and the accessories are very useful. It’s perfect for practicing, especially in winter!
customer_reviews.author: Talia Clayton

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift
customer_reviews.text: My son plays golf. My research on putting aids showed it to be better when compared to others I looked at.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice surface
customer_reviews.text: It really does have four different speeds! Right out of the box it lays flat. There are two golfers in the family and we both like it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Jansa

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied. Feel soft when touching
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied. Feel soft when touching, does not lose hair. Striking appearance, high cost performance. The dimension is appropriate too.
customer_reviews.author: Xiuxiu

customer_reviews.title: Take it with you
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a mat that is easily portable and of good quality and this one fits the bill..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: when golf course is shut it is a blessing
customer_reviews.text: It does what it says - very satisfied. Just hope my putting improves
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Michael Lewis

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this product
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this product! Balls roll as if they are on green with different green speeds. Length of mat is perfect to practice long and short putts.
customer_reviews.author: PEF

customer_reviews.title: Great for all ages
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it, he uses it in his room daily. The obstacles is what made this stand out.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product for indoor practice . Speed very close to real green
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love how the mat traces the ball movement, I could repeat the same shot over and over. Very good product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Michal

customer_reviews.title: Great product.!!!
customer_reviews.text: The putting mat is fantastic for all golfers of all abilities and handicaps from beginner to pro.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Ralph Clark

customer_reviews.title: great putting matt if you're looking for more realistic feel ...
customer_reviews.text: great putting matt if you're looking for more realistic feel of greens. Obviously not as good as the real thing but for a putting matt this is the best i've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Warnee

customer_reviews.title: Don't fret, this is greatl!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I've tried several and this is the most realistic feel out of the others.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his new putting mat...it really helps him with his short game.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: it was really good, all the golfer should own it
customer_reviews.text: it was really good ,all the golfer should own it
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift for my husband. Loves it
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband for Christmas. He loves it and has shown it to anybody that stops by the house the gift & I've heard him on the phone explaining how useful this is. So I think I picked a great gift! I tried it out myself and it actually helped me once I saw how I was putting and made corrections.
customer_reviews.author: RobertsMom

customer_reviews.title: ... the fast side a bit slower than I would like. I won't say I am setting everything up ...
customer_reviews.text: This rolls on the fast side a bit slower than I would like. I won't say I am setting everything up just right... but its an ok mat
customer_reviews.author: Joel Banks

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY - NOT WORTH IT
customer_reviews.text: The Foam wedges are garbage and do not work. The cup that you putt to is cheap and worthless. Total waste of money. Do not buy. I would put 0 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Dusty

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product came with the box all tore up and half the pieces missing. Was NOT impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Tobin Soderberg

customer_reviews.title: Fun Fun Fun
customer_reviews.text: My husband and daughter have really enjoyed this putting mat! Quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: ksvedersky

product_meta.title: PROADVANCED ProInfinity Putting Mat - 4 Speed Golf Green Simulator - Giftbox Package - for Training - for Family - for Party
feature_bullets: UNIQUE DESIGNS - The Brand-New Metal Golf Goal and Slope Simulators bring 3X value and experience. You can create your Own and Unique Green in INFINITY Ways! ADJUSTABLE SPEEDS - Choose from 4 Stimp tested speeds ranging from 8-12.5 on one indoor putting green!

VISIBLE BALL TRACES - Analyze and Correct Your Putt with Visible Ball Traces. Perfect Your Alignment and Acceleration with Stroke Guide Line.! PROFESSIONAL TRAINING - Perfect Your Distance and Direction Control with 25 Training Bands. By following the 20 pages guide book written by our professional golf coach, you can quickly improve your putting skills to master level.
COMPETITIVE & FUN - The most cost-effective solution for family and company indoor/outdoor party or team building event. It can easily boost the party atmosphere and get everyone engaged!

SUPERIOR QUALITY - ProInfinity Putting Green is made with Top Level Polyester Material and 100% Eco-friendly(Totally safe for kids and pets). The durable backing material that guarantees the mat unrolls flat and rolls up smooth all the time with long-lasting durability.

UNCOMPARABLE PRICE & ENHANCED SERVICE - With so many newly added features and accessories, we still keep the same price for our customers. We are also improving our customer service to guarantee your 100% satisfaction.
